_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:19:05 using v2.0
title: How has the number of staff being ill with work related stress changed by provider?
analysis_commentary: The increase in staff reporting work-related stress in the previous 12 months observed between 2011 and 2012 is seen consistently in the majority of trusts (97% of trusts that have data for both years).
data_source: Department of Health, Survey of NHS staff
